Description:
Detects the creation of a named file stream with the imphash of a well-known hack tool

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool Named File Stream Created
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (hash like '%IMPHASH=BCCA3C247B619DCD13C8CDFF5F123932%' or hash like '%IMPHASH=3A19059BD7688CB88E70005F18EFC439%' or hash like '%IMPHASH=bf6223a49e45d99094406777eb6004ba%' or hash like '%IMPHASH=0C106686A31BFE2BA931AE1CF6E9DBC6%' or hash like '%IMPHASH=0D1447D4B3259B3C2A1D4CFB7ECE13C3%' or hash like '%IMPHASH=66EE036DF5FC1004D9ED5E9A94A1086A%' or hash like '%IMPHASH=672B13F4A0B6F27D29065123FE882DFC%' or hash like '%IMPHASH=6BBD59CEA665C4AFCC2814C1327EC91F%' or hash like
